謚号: (しごう) - posthumous name (based the deeds one has performed in their lifetime)
講: (kou) - lecture , (Budista) lecture meeting; religious association; mutual assistance association (i.e. for financial assistance)
講じる: (こうじる) - to take measures/to work out a plan; to lecture/to read aloud; to confer
講ずる: (こうずる) - to take measures/to work out a plan; to lecture/to read aloud; to confer
講会: (こうかい) - meeting (esp. of a mutual financing association)
講和条件: (こうわじょうけん) - peace terms; conditions of peace
講和条約: (こうわじょうやく) - peace treaty
講壇社会主義: (こうだんしゃかいしゅぎ) - academic socialism; professorial socialism
講師料: (こうしりょう) - lecture fee; teaching fee
講座: (kouza) - academic teaching unit, lectureship, professorial chair; course (ex. de palestras)
講書: (こうしょ) - interpretation of a book
講書始: (こうしょはじめ) - Imperial New Year's Lectures (ceremony in which the emperor and members of the imperial family Their Majesties listen to expert lectures in the fields of human, social and natural sciences)
講演会: (こうえんかい) - lecture (esp. special engagement by noted speaker); lecture meeting (event with one or more lectures)
講究: (こうきゅう) - specialization (in a field of study); study
講義室: (こうぎしつ) - lecture hall; lecture room
講習会: (こうしゅうかい) - class; short course
講習会場: (こうしゅうかいじょう) - training center; training centre
講習料: (こうしゅうりょう) - course fees; training fees
講評: (こうひょう) - criticism (by a teacher or coach, with commentary, especially at a poetry reading); review; critique
講談本: (こうだんぼん) - book of oral narratives; story book
謝す: (しゃす) - to thank; to apologize/to apologise; to say farewell/to retreat/to retire; to refuse; to pay back/to settle old scores
謝する: (しゃする) - to thank; to apologize/to apologise; to say farewell/to retreat/to retire; to refuse; to pay back/to settle old scores
謝る: (あやまる) - to apologize; to apologise
謝恩使: (しゃおんし) - Ryukyuan mission to Edo upon the change of the Ryukyuan King
謝状: (しゃじょう) - thank-you letter; letter of apology
謝礼金: (しゃれいきん) - reward money; reward; honorarium
謝罪広告: (しゃざいこうこく) - published apology
謝金: (しゃきん) - reward; monetary expression of thanks
謡: (utai) - () - canto de noh, canto de noh, recitação
謡い物: (うたいもの) - utai (noh chant) piece for recitation
謡う: (うたう) - to sing; (esp. 歌う, 詠う) to sing (one's praises in a poem, etc.)/to compose a poem/to recite a poem
謡を謡う: (うたいをうたう) - to recite an utai (noh chant)
謡物: (うたいもの) - utai (noh chant) piece for recitation
謦咳: (けいがい) - cough/hawking; laughing and talking at the same time/speak laughing
謦咳に接する: (けいがいにせっする) - to meet someone in person; to have the pleasure of meeting
謬り: (あやまり) - error; mistake; slip; bug
謬る: (あやまる) - to make a mistake/to err; to mislead/to misguide
謬妄: (びゅうもう) - fallacy/conjecture; baseless thing/random thing
謳い文句: (うたいもんく) - catchphrase; promotional line
謳う: (うたう) - to extol/to sing the praises of/to celebrate; to declare/to stipulate/to express/to state/to insist
謳われる: (うたわれる) - to be famed/to be extolled/to have one's praises sung/to be celebrated/to be admired; to be stipulated/to be declared/to be clearly expressed
謳歌: (おうか) - rejoicing; glorification; exultation; celebration; enjoyment; singing praises
謹む: (つつしむ) - (usu. 慎む) to be careful/to be discreet; (usu. 慎む) to do in moderation/to refrain (from overdoing)/to abstain; (謹む only) to be reverent; to be purified/to be chaste
謹んで申し上げます: (つつしんでもうしあげます) - I wish to state respectfully that...
謹勅: (きんちょく) - deep modesty; deep discretion
謹厳: (きんげん) - stern; grave; solemn; sobersided
謹厳実直: (きんげんじっちょく) - (yoji) sober and honest
謹呈: (きんてい) - humbly presenting/respecfully presenting; (when giving a book, etc.) with the author's compliments
謹告: (きんこく) - informing with respect; announcing respectfully
謹啓: (きんけい) - (letters that open with this usu. end with 敬白, 謹言, or 敬具) Dear Sir or Madam; Dear Sirs; Gentlemen
謹慎: (kinshin) - autocontrole, moderação do comportamento, penitência, disciplina; confinamento em casa, prisão domiciliar
